name: Shapecraft
description:
Shapecraft is a game about finding the final form. Join the pieces together and craft new shapes in this calm and beautiful puzzler.

Your goal is simple - put the blocks into the right places. Join the slices to reveal a new shape, but remember to light up all the little dots! Putting pieces together is one thing, but finding the right combination is a challenge.

This calm and peaceful puzzle game will help you relax and focus. The atmospheric music and colorful backgrounds will let you clear your head. You need your mind in shape to find the solution. No need to hurry - you have all the time in the world.

Enjoy!
